transcript.text: shabbat shalom and happy yom kippur this
is daniel john lee with tour restoration
ministries this is the third of the five
videos that I'm making for Yom Kippur
the Sabbath hallelujah we're going to
talk about a very very sober topic today
as I'm going on this beautiful journey
here in the Pacific Northwest for Yom
Kippur if you look at the book of
Zechariah and you read in Zechariah
chapter 5 Zechariah chapter 5 has a very
interesting passage in it that has
remained a mystery for a lot of people
for a long time talks about this flying
scroll talks about this Aoife or barrel
talks about a woman going into this
barrel is Aoife in it you know and then
it talks about how two women come out
and it's great wickedness and all of
these all of these curious examples that
that are talked about in Zechariah
chapter 5 well it is Yom Kippur it's a
very sober day a day that we afflict our
souls you know we don't eat we don't
drink it's a day of repentance and
fasting and prayer a day of affliction
and so I thought it was appropriate to
reveal some very prophetic and important
things about what's about to occur
between the years 2014 and the years
2017 it's basically going to be the time
of the son of perdition the time of the
wicked one the abomination of desolation
that will occur on March 11 2014 and
continue on for 42 months so I'm just
going to read my scriptures here real
quickly and I'm going to open up to
Zechariah chapter 5 just because thakur
I'd does a much better job at
articulating this than I would and in
Zechariah 5 we said this is the vision
that he has then I turned and I lifted
up mine eyes and looked and behold a
flying scroll and he said unto me what
seest thou and I said I see a flying
scroll the length thereof is twenty
cubits and the breadth thereof is ten
cubits then he said unto me this is the
curse that goes forth over the face of
the whole earth for everyone that steals
shall be cut off as on this side
according to it and everyone that swears
falsely shall be cut off on that side
according to it I will bring it forth
says Yahweh savvy oat and it shall enter
into the house of the thief and into the

name talking about hypocrites right
there and it shall remain in the midst
of his house and shall consume it with
the timber thereof and the stones
thereof then the angel that talked with
me went forth and said unto me lift up
now your eyes and see what is this that
goes forth and I said what is it and he
said this is an ephah or a large basket
it's a measuring basket that goes forth
he said moreover this is their
resemblance through all the earth and
behold there was lifted up a talent of
lead and this is a woman that sits in
the midst of the barrel of the ephah and
he said this is wickedness and he cast
it into the midst of the ephah and he
cast the weight of lead upon the mouth
of the barrel of the ephah then lifted
up mine eyes and looked and behold there
came out to women and the wind was in
their wings where they had wings like
the wings of a stork and I lifted up the
ephah the barrel between the earth and
the heaven then said I did the angel
that talked with me whither do these
bear this Aoife and he said to me to
build it a house in the land of Shinar
Babylon and it shall be established and
set their upon her own base I've talked
about how there's going to be a time
coming up next spring where Yahshua is
going to send out his chariots of fire
he's going to gather his true people to
the safe place it's going to be
somewhere east of Jerusalem I don't know
where the location is but he's going to
supernaturally just like he did with
Elijah he transported him on a chair to
fire from one location of birth to
another watch message 32 144,000 for
more details just as he translated
Philip from one place to another in the

people in a in a
a horizontal gathering to the safe place
it's a revelation 12 or the woman flees
into the safe place for twelve hundred
and sixty days and then at the end of

occurs or what Christians call the

who maybe they profess the name of

they maybe there's a lot of Messianic
